name: UltrasoundOfLowerExtremities
title: Ultrasound of Lower Extremities
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this SNOMED CT value set is to represent concepts for ultrasound of the lower extremities.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnostic Study.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent ultrasound of veins of the lower extremities.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
